text: Tinley Park is a village in Cook County, Illinois, United States, with a small part in Will County. 55,971 people lived there at the 2020 census. It was once one of the fastest growing suburbs southwest of Chicago. In 2009, BusinessWeek called Tinley Park the best place to raise a family in America. In 2017, Tinley Park was listed as one of the 50 safest cities in America. ==References== Category:Villages in Illinois Category:Settlements in Cook County, Illinois Category:Suburbs of Chicago
title: Tinley Park, Illinois
